contentJson: ["The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth.

contentJson: ["Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.

contentJson: ["For I rejoiced greatly, when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, even as thou walkest in the truth."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: For I rejoiced greatly, when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, even as thou walkest in the truth.

contentJson: ["I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.

contentJson: ["Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers;

contentJson: ["Which have borne witness of thy charity before the church: whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort, thou shalt do well:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Which have borne witness of thy charity before the church: whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort, thou shalt do well:

contentJson: ["Because that for his name’s sake they went forth, taking nothing of the Gentiles."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Because that for his name’s sake they went forth, taking nothing of the Gentiles.

contentJson: ["We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth.

contentJson: ["I wrote unto the church: but Diotrephes, who loveth to have the preeminence among them, receiveth us not."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: I wrote unto the church: but Diotrephes, who loveth to have the preeminence among them, receiveth us not.

contentJson: ["Wherefore, if I come, I will remember his deeds which he doeth, prating against us with malicious words: and not content therewith, neither doth he himself receive the brethren, and forbiddeth them that would, and casteth them out of the church."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Wherefore, if I come, I will remember his deeds which he doeth, prating against us with malicious words: and not content therewith, neither doth he himself receive the brethren, and forbiddeth them that would, and casteth them out of the church.

contentJson: ["Beloved, follow not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that doeth good is of God: but he that doeth evil hath not seen God."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Beloved, follow not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that doeth good is of God: but he that doeth evil hath not seen God.

contentJson: ["Demetrius hath good report of all men, and of the truth itself: yea, and we also bear record; and ye know that our record is true."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Demetrius hath good report of all men, and of the truth itself: yea, and we also bear record; and ye know that our record is true.

contentJson: ["I had many things to write, but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: I had many things to write, but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee:

contentJson: ["But I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak face to face. Peace be to thee. Our friends salute thee. Greet the friends by name."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: But I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak face to face. Peace be to thee. Our friends salute thee. Greet the friends by name.
